name: LÖÖPS (Tamail)
description:
The lööp pandemic is ruining the whole cat population - which didn't go unnoticed by their owners. They have a nasty trick up their sleeves! "You get stuck in the lööp of shame? Well, don't come begging for food until you lose it!"

Help those poor beings get back into shape so they can eat more of their beloved food!

(This is our small take on Cookie-clicker like idle games - packed with, hopefully, humorous exercise machines, motivational banners and, most importantly, story. Thank you very much for playing!)

Made for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck in a loop

Done with Godot engine, Procreate, liters of coffee and few hours of sleep.

Nephirus - programming, balancing, game design, stupid jokes and the best coffee
Tamail - 2D art, animation, game design, even stupider jokes and playing with nerves
